content: in a court case one party was ordered to cover the procedural costs but the specific amount was not mentioned the case lasted for 3 years and 9 months but the final resolution was not provided the text explains the progress of the case including a divorce and division of joint assets the court made a partial decision on the divorce and scheduled a hearing for the division of assets in september 2023 the claimants representative informed the court that they have been in contact with their client and are ready to proceed however neither the claimant nor the respondent appeared in court leading to the dismissal of the claim the court noted that the defendants assets had significantly changed due to a criminal case the court dismissed the lawsuit and allowed the parties to bear the procedural costs
